About
About
Associate Consultant at Bain & Company's Private Equity Group (PEG). 3+ years of experience across commercial due diligence, D2C, and operations strategy. MBA from IIM Bangalore and B.Tech from IIT Bombay. I’ve contributed to scaling early-stage startups and driving profitability across consumer brands. Passionate about solving complex business problems and building with impact.
